Version 1.21.0 ppl phone --type added

Further increasing the expressiveness of ppl’s commands, this release brings the --type option to ppl phone. With this option, the vCard format’s TYPE parameter in the TEL field is now exposed to users. This allows you to label phone numbers in a way that doesn’t break compatibility with other software.
